Package com.sun.enterprise.security.perms

    Class Description
    DeclaredPermissionsProcessor  
    EarEEPermissionsProcessor

    PermissionsProcessor  
    PermissionXMLParser
    Paser to parse permissions.xml packaged in a ear or in a standalone module
    PermsArchiveDelegate  
    PermsArchiveDelegate.SetPermissionsAction  
    SMGlobalPolicyUtil
    Utility class to load the EE permissions, EE restrictions, and check restrictions for a given permission set

    XMLPermissionsHandler
    Utility class to get declared permissions
